messages.title: The Change Wales Needs
messages.content: With Labour's demise, England is voting Conservative. This means the Conservatives will form the next Government. Scotland will look after their own interests. Who do you trust to defend Wales and to get the best deal for our nation?

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Plaid Cymru will ensure that there are more doctors and nurses to care for you and your family, wherever you live in Wales.
By investing in infrastructure and high quality training, we can create thousands of good jobs.
We believe in defending everyone – those who are born here and those who choose to come here.
By remaining part of the Single Market, we can protect jobs and our economy.
We will ensure Wales is not sidelined in the Brexit negotiations.

mentions.tacticalSituation: With Labour's demise, England is voting Conservative. This means the Conservatives will form the next Government.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Vote Plaid Cymru – the Party of Wales on June 8th.
